name: VOLTSmartLighting
0:
”Alexa, dim the lights”
”Alexa, turn on lights”
”Alexa, turn off lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: You can now use Alexa to control outdoor landscape lighting with the comfort of voice. This skill requires the smart home solution powered by VOLT Lighting, which includes the VOLT Lighting Transformer and BLE mesh enabled fixtures. The skill supports lights and other devices made by VOLT Lighting. To use the skill features, you need to download and create an account on the VOLT Smart app from your playstore on Android devices and App Store on iOS.
